appl.desc.appl.desc: Description . . . . . . . . . : Set The Query Field (Field Name=sql) In signaturemake To false For Tables That Are Add Only

This application reads a specified patches record, and for each table in it that is Add Only, it sets the query field in the corresponding signaturemake record to false. Additionally, it also sets this field in the signaturemake record to false for the following tables:

These are tables that have an entry in signaturemake but NOT in the patches record. (The code and format tables also fall in this category (ie, they have an entry in signaturemake but NOT in patches), but they are NOT set to false because their signatures still need to be generated.)
This application was written because we (ie, per PBudic) did NOT want to maintain two versions of the signaturemake file:
. one that is used by the Differential Upgrade for doing the Apps Build
. another one to be used when building the Application Upgrade

What will happen is that the signaturemake on curdev will remain the way it is, but when the Application Upgrade is built (it is always built based on a copy of curdev anyway), this application will be run prior to building the Application Upgrade. The signaturemake file as modified by this application is for AND ONLY FOR the purpose of building the Application Upgrade. It doesn't go anywhere else.
Parameters in to (I) or out from (O) this application are:
Seq Parm Type I/O (in this app) Description
1 name I $INTO.PATCH The patches record to be used
